meta.label: Misspelling Correction
meta.description: Identify and correct misspellings in a text column

inputRoles.name: input_dataset
inputRoles.label: Input dataset
inputRoles.description: Dataset with text columns containing misspelled words

inputRoles.name: custom_vocabulary
inputRoles.label: Custom vocabulary (optional)
inputRoles.description: Dataset with a single column for words that should not be corrected

inputRoles.name: custom_corrections
inputRoles.label: Custom corrections (optional)
inputRoles.description: Dataset with the first column for words and the second one for their correction

outputRoles.name: output_dataset
outputRoles.label: Output dataset
outputRoles.description: Dataset with identified misspellings and corrected text

outputRoles.name: diagnosis_dataset
outputRoles.label: Diagnosis dataset
outputRoles.description: Dataset with diagnosis on each word

params.name: edit_distance
params.label: Edit distance
params.description: Maximum edit distance between a word and its correction. Increase to correct more.

params.name: ignore_word_regex
params.label: Ignore pattern
params.description: Regular expression for words not to be corrected. Ex: "\w+\d" to preserve "home1".
